review: It works great, I'm am still getting to know it!!!!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Is there a monthly fee to use the fire stick?, I have another android stick which is no charges
author: william

review: I can't begin to tell you how cool this thing it.  I am a person who isn't even remotely tech savvy but the fire stick was as easy to set up as plugging in your cell phone to the wall charger.  Very simple directions and since I was already a prime member it immediately loaded up knowing who I was and pulled all of my movies and pictures from my Kindle.  Its super simple to navigate even without watching the cute cartoon at the set up.  I started downloading different apps right away and spent a good portion of the night ignoring my family while I watched You Tube videos of crazy cats on my big screen TV.  I wanted this to be able to watch my Prime TV shows and movies without having to watch them on my Kindle (I love the Outlander books and purchased season 1 to watch in HD and on a larger screen.)  I highly recommend the Fire Stick!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Amazon Fire Stick was eazy to use. It took lest time to connect to the tv and sharper pictures.
author: C.Sky

review: This met our expectations,  but was $15 cheaper the week after we purchased.  Would have given 5 stars if it wasn't for that.  Really like the remote control app for the phone!
author: Richie Y.

review: I have one in my bedroom, and one on my living room.  I love it!  Casting made easy! Makes me wonder why I ever paid for cable in the first place. Looking forward to more app options in the future!
author: AK

review: We loved our Fire stick so much we bought a second for our bedroom. It is used daily.
author: James Branch

review: should have gotten this when I first became a Prime Member!!!
